welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Marlborough, where charm meets modernity! Known for its beautiful wineries and picturesque landscapes, we invite you to explore and indulge in the beauty of our city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the Wi-Fi network for free by selecting 'FlyWorcester' from the list of available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Municipal Airport, where all commercial flights arrive and depart.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Central Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
